reviewText: If you like horror, you will love this.

I saw this originally when it first premiered on LMN & really liked it.  Several years later I stumbled upon it on Amazon & bought it.  I think it has been edited & shortened since the original, but not so much that it hurt the story.  It is such an unusual story, particularly for network TV.  But  that is why I like it. Good special effects too.
I enjoyed this movie slot but it did get off to a slow start. I just wish Lifetime had made another movie clearing up a few things.
loved the movie  and it was hard to find
